Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for TaiDoc U-RIGHT and FORA Blood Glucose Monitoring Systems utilizing electrochemical biosensor technology for glucose measurement
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in whole blood samples from fingertips for self-testing at home (single patient use) and multiple-patient use in professional healthcare settings, not for neonatal use or diagnosis/screening of diabetes
